name: ResponseFlag
title: responseFlag
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts allowing the placer (sending) application to determine the amount of information to be returned from the filler.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the ORC segment.

concepts.display: Same as E, also Replacement and Parent-Child
Same as R, also other associated segments
concepts.definition: Report exceptions, replacement, parent-child and other associated segments

concepts.display: Same as D, plus confirmations explicitly
concepts.definition: Report exceptions, replacement, parent-child, other associated segments and explicit confirmations

concepts.display: Only the MSA segment is returned
